answers.text:
Hi Michael, 
Thank you for the question! We have many resources which may be useful to you. 
•   This is the Annual Budget Manual which covers the finance department from the University of Tennessee Municipal Technical Advisory Services. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/1439
•   This is an excerpt from the Town of Addison Budget Book which covers some of there fiscal policy. http://webapps.icma.org/conference_Handouts/handouts2013/Pages%20from%202013%20Council%20Adopted%20Budget%20Document.pdf
Additionally there are many resources in ICMA’s bookstore. If there are any local government officials that would be willing to share their financial policy guide or manual please upload it to the documents area of the website (http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/documentform) so that others may be able to access the manual in the future. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org
